attributes.action: implement a pension plan for the Parlimentry servants of the people, othewise known as Members of Parliment, that is equal to the state pension recieved by those that generate the capital to pay for their Parlimentry servants pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is surely not logical for a body of people financed by tax payers to recieve a pension far in excess of that achievable by the average tax payer.
